results.name: a(n) = (A001222(n) - 1)*A001221(n) + 2.
comment: a(n) appears to differ from A000005 at n = 1  and when n is a term of A320632. Verified up to n=3000.
See also _Charlie Neder_'s May 14 2019 comment in A307409.
